collections_text:
[](http://www.smjhouse.org/gardenterrace)

# LEARN ABOUT OUR CAPITAL CAMPAIGN!

## Show your LOVE!

If you love history and old houses, we need your help! Our programs depend on our community’s support. Click here to donate today!

[Donate now!](https://buy.stripe.com/5kAaEE1bCcLD5Ve4gj)

## Explore the Skinner Butte Neighborhood

If you love history and great stories, take a walk around our wonderful neighborhood and learn the stories from your neighbors!

[Start walking!](http://www.skinnerbuttehistory.org)

###  Want to visit? No advanced tickets/reservations   
are necessary for tours.

****

<https://www.elle-roses.com>

Steampunk Tea tickets will go on sale to Shelton Members on January 7th and to the McMurphey Level on January 20th. 

**Sweetheart Tea Tickets went on sale to the public on January 7th.**

[Look for all of our event tickets in our store!](https://smjhouse.org/smj-house-store)

<https://www.elle-roses.com>

****

<https://www.elle-roses.com>

Our mission is to preserve the Shelton McMurphey Johnson House for the benefit of current and future generations. In doing so, we will be our community’s storyteller through the lens of inclusive historic preservation.

<https://www.elle-roses.com>

##  The Shelton McMurphey Johnson House

##  is open 6 days a week.* 

## 

## 

No advanced tickets for tours are required.

Closed on Mondays.****

*Please check [our calendar](https://smjhouse.org/events/) or call for event closures.
